'''Seagrass''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] commonly found in the wild all over [[Inazuma]].

==How to Obtain==
Seagrass commonly grows in shallow waters of Inazuma, most often along its coastlines.

See the<!--Video Guides section or the--> '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=201 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
